get.description: Retrieves the details of a RouteMap.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the RouteMap's resource group.

parameters.name: virtualHubName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualHub containing the RouteMap.

parameters.name: routeMapName
parameters.description: The name of the RouteMap.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the RouteMap retrieved.

associatedInboundConnections.description: List of connections which have this RoutMap associated for inbound traffic.

associatedOutboundConnections.description: List of connections which have this RoutMap associated for outbound traffic.

rules.description: List of RouteMap rules to be applied.

name.description: The unique name for the rule.

matchCriteria.description: List of matching criterion which will be applied to traffic.

routePrefix.description: List of route prefixes which this criteria matches.

community.description: List of BGP communities which this criteria matches.

asPath.description: List of AS paths which this criteria matches.

matchCondition.description: Match condition to apply RouteMap rules.

items.description: A matching criteria which matches routes based on route prefix, community, and AS path.

actions.description: List of actions which will be applied on a match.

type.description: Type of action to be taken. Supported types are 'Remove', 'Add', 'Replace', and 'Drop.'

parameters.description: List of parameters relevant to the action.For instance if type is drop then parameters has list of prefixes to be dropped.If type is add, parameters would have list of ASN numbers to be added

items.description: Action to be taken on a route matching a RouteMap criterion.

nextStepIfMatched.description: Next step after rule is evaluated. Current supported behaviors are 'Continue'(to next rule) and 'Terminate'.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the RouteMap resource.

parameters.name: hubVirtualNetworkConnectionParameters

properties.description: Properties of the hub virtual network connection.

allowHubToRemoteVnetTransit.description: Deprecated: VirtualHub to RemoteVnet transit to enabled or not.

allowRemoteVnetToUseHubVnetGateways.description: Deprecated: Allow RemoteVnet to use Virtual Hub's gateways.

routingConfiguration.description: The Routing Configuration indicating the associated and propagated route tables on this connection.

propagatedRouteTables.description: The list of RouteTables to advertise the routes to.

ids.description: The list of resource ids of all the RouteTables.

vnetRoutes.description: List of routes that control routing from VirtualHub into a virtual network connection.

staticRoutesConfig.description: Configuration for static routes on this HubVnetConnection.

propagateStaticRoutes.description: Boolean indicating whether static routes on this connection are automatically propagate to route tables which this connection propagates to.

vnetLocalRouteOverrideCriteria.description: Parameter determining whether NVA in spoke vnet is bypassed for traffic with destination in spoke.

name.description: The name of the StaticRoute that is unique within a VnetRoute.

nextHopIpAddress.description: The ip address of the next hop.
